===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|かつお|yomi=k}}
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|カツオ}}
[[File:Katsuwonus pelamis.jpg|thumb]]
/katuwo/ → /katuo/

From compound of {{compound|lang=ja|堅|tr1=kata|t1=[[hard]]|魚|tr2=uo|[[fish]]|sort=かつお}}, from the long-standing practice of drying lower-grade tuna into hard blocks.

Alternately, from compound of {{compound|lang=ja|搗つ|tr1=katsu|t1=to [[subdue]] by [[strike|striking]]|魚|tr2=uo|t2=fish|sort=かつお}}, from the way in which these fish were subdued when catching them.

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|堅魚}}, {{ja-l|松魚}}

{{ja-pron|かつお|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK|y=k}}
